short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a couple of extra options when browsing old.reddit.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds several extra functions to enhance the reddit experience. 
With this extension you can filter subreddits and post titles by keywords, hide the karma counter and stop media from opening once you enter the comment section.
